meanings.definition: The dried fatty seeds of a cacao tree, from which cocoa, cocoa butter, and chocolate are made.
meanings.sent1: I love the smell of cocoas when they are being turned into chocolate.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a cup of cocoas to make the delicious chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the bag of cocoas and tried to make its own chocolate.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as rich and comforting as the aroma of freshly ground cocoas.
meanings.sent5: The sun set behind the cacao tree, casting a warm glow over the pile of cocoas.

meanings.definition: A powder made from roasted, husked, and ground cacao seeds, used in baking and for making drinks.
meanings.sent1: The baker sifted the cocoas into the mixing bowl to prepare the brownies.
meanings.sent2: Hot cocoas are perfect for warming up on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they accidentally spilled the cocoas all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly brewed coffee blended with the sweet scent of cocoas in the air.
meanings.sent5: The hot drink was a comforting blend of milk, sugar, and rich cocoas.
